revised_title: On the Chemical Relations of Oxymuriatic Gas and Oxygene with Inflammable Bodies
tldr: The author investigates the chemical reactions between oxymuriatic gas, oxygene, and inflammable bodies, focusing on the production of alkali. He discusses the formation of peroxides and their properties, as well as the decomposition of these compounds. The author also explores the electrical decomposition of potash and soda, and the properties of pure alkalies.
